object.name: Device.ZigBee.
object.description: Top level object for ZigBee capabilities based on the {{bibref|ZigBee2007}} specification.

parameter.name: InterfaceNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: ZDONumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.ZigBee.Interface.{i}.
object.description: ZigBee interface table (a stackable interface object as described in {{bibref|TR-181i2|Section 4.2}}). This table models the ZigBee interface of a ZigBee end device, ZigBee router or ZigBee coordinator.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enables or disables the interface. This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.description:
The current operational state of the interface (see {{bibref|TR-181i2|Section 4.2.2}}). {{enum}}
When {{param|Enable}} is {{false}} then {{param}} SHOULD normally be {{enum|Down}} (or {{enum|NotPresent}} or {{enum|Error}} if there is a fault condition on the interface).
When {{param|Enable}} is changed to {{true}} then {{param}} SHOULD change to {{enum|Up}} if and only if the interface is able to transmit and receive network traffic; it SHOULD change to {{enum|Dormant}} if and only if the interface is operable but is waiting for external actions before it can transmit and receive network traffic (and subsequently change to {{enum|Up}} if still operable when the expected actions have completed); it SHOULD change to {{enum|LowerLayerDown}} if and only if the interface is prevented from entering the {{enum|Up}} state because one or more of the interfaces beneath it is down; it SHOULD remain in the {{enum|Error}} state if there is an error or other fault condition detected on the interface; it SHOULD remain in the {{enum|NotPresent}} state if the interface has missing (typically hardware) components; it SHOULD change to {{enum|Unknown}} if the state of the interface can not be determined for some reason.
This parameter is based on ''ifOperStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: Alias
parameter.description: {{datatype|expand}}

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: The textual name of the interface as assigned by the CPE.

parameter.name: LastChange
parameter.description: The accumulated time in {{units}} since the interface entered its current operational state.

parameter.name: LowerLayers
parameter.description: {{list}} {{reference|an interface object that is stacked immediately below this interface object}} See {{bibref|TR-181i2|Section 4.2.1}}.

parameter.name: IEEEAddress
parameter.description: The IEEE address assigned to this interface. A value of "FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF" indicates that this address is unknown. This parameter has the same value as the {{param|#.ZDO.{i}.IEEEAddress}} parameter of the ZDO instance {{param|ZDOReference}} is pointing to.

parameter.name: NetworkAddress
ZDOReference
parameter.description: The ZigBee Device Object assigned to this interface.

parameter.name: AssociatedDeviceNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.ZigBee.Interface.{i}.Stats.
object.description:
Throughput statistics for this interface.
The CPE MUST reset the interface's Stats parameters (unless otherwise stated in individual object or parameter descriptions) either when the interface becomes operationally down due to a previous administrative down (i.e. the interface's {{param|#.Status}} parameter transitions to a down state after the interface is disabled) or when the interface becomes administratively up (i.e. the interface's {{param|#.Enable}} parameter transitions from {{false}} to {{true}}). Administrative and operational interface status is discussed in {{bibref|TR-181i2|section 4.2.2}}.

parameter.name: BytesSent
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} transmitted out of the interface, including framing characters.

parameter.name: BytesReceived
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} received on the interface, including framing characters.

parameter.name: PacketsSent
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} sent transmitted out of the interface.

parameter.name: PacketsReceived
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} received by the interface.

parameter.name: ErrorsSent
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} discarded by interface due to any error.

parameter.name: ErrorsReceived
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} received that contained errors preventing them from being delivered to a higher-layer protocol.

parameter.name: UnicastPacketsSent
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} requested for transmission which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this layer, including those that were discarded or not sent.

parameter.name: UnicastPacketsReceived
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} received which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this layer.

parameter.name: DiscardPacketsSent
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} requested for transmission which were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent the {{units}} being transmitted.

parameter.name: DiscardPacketsReceived
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} received which were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being delivered.

parameter.name: MulticastPacketsSent
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} requested for transmission which were addressed to a multicast address at this layer, including those that were discarded or not sent.

parameter.name: MulticastPacketsReceived
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} received which were addressed to a multicast address at this layer and delivered by this layer to a higher layer.

parameter.name: BroadcastPacketsSent
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} requested for transmission which were addressed to a broadcast address at this layer, including those that were discarded or not sent.

parameter.name: BroadcastPacketsReceived
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} received which were addressed to a broadcast address at this layer and delivered by this layer to a higher layer.

parameter.name: UnknownPacketsReceived
parameter.description: The total number of {{units}} received which were discarded because of an unknown or unsupported protocol.

object.name: Device.ZigBee.Interface.{i}.AssociatedDevice.{i}.

parameter.name: IEEEAddress
parameter.description: The IEEE address assigned to this device. A value of "FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF" indicates that this address is unknown.

parameter.name: NetworkAddress
parameter.description: The ZigBee network address assigned to this device.

parameter.name: Active
parameter.description:
Whether or not this device is currently present in the ZigBee network as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.4.4.1}}.
The ability to list inactive devices is OPTIONAL. If the CPE includes inactive devices in this table, {{param}} MUST be set to {{false}} for each inactive device. The length of time an inactive device remains listed in this table is a local matter to the CPE.

parameter.name: ZDOReference
parameter.description: The ZigBee Device Object assigned to this interface.

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.

parameter.name: Alias
parameter.description: {{datatype|expand}}

parameter.name: IEEEAddress
parameter.description: The IEEE address assigned to this device. A value of "FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF" indicates that this address is unknown.

parameter.name: NetworkAddress
parameter.description: The ZigBee network address assigned to this device.

parameter.name: BindingTableNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: GroupNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: ApplicationEndpointNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.NodeDescriptor.
object.description: The {{object}} object describes the node capabilities of the ZigBee device as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.3.2.3 Node Descriptor}}.

parameter.name: LogicalType
ComplexDescriptorSupported
parameter.description: When {{true}}, specifies that the {{object|#.ComplexDescriptor}} object is supported for this ZigBee device.

parameter.name: UserDescriptorSupported
parameter.description: When {{true}}, specifies that the {{object|#.UserDescriptor}} object is supported for this ZigBee device.

parameter.name: FrequencyBand
MACCapability

enumeration.description: The current power source is mains power
The receiver is on when idle

parameter.name: ManufactureCode
parameter.description: Specifies a manufacturer code that is allocated by the ZigBee Alliance, relating the manufacturer to the device.

parameter.name: MaximumBufferSize
parameter.description: Specifies the maximum buffer size, in {{units}}, of the network sub-layer data unit (NSDU) for this ZigBee device.

parameter.name: MaximumIncomingTransferSize
parameter.description: Specifies the maximum size, in {{units}}, of the application sub-layer data unit (ASDU) that can be transferred to this ZigBee device in one single message transfer.

parameter.name: MaximumOutgoingTransferSize
parameter.description: Specifies the maximum size, in {{units}}, of the application sub-layer data unit (ASDU) that can be transferred from this ZigBee device in one single message transfer.

parameter.name: ServerMask
parameter.description:
Specifies the system server capabilities of this ZigBee device.
{{list}} {{enum}}

parameter.name: DescriptorCapability
parameter.description:
Specifies the descriptor capabilities of this ZigBee device.
{{list}} {{enum}}

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.PowerDescriptor.
object.description: The {{object}} object describes the power capabilities of the ZigBee device as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.3.2.4 Node Power Descriptor}}.

parameter.name: CurrentPowerMode
parameter.description:
Specifies the current sleep/power-saving mode of the ZigBee device.
{{enum}}

parameter.name: AvailablePowerSource
parameter.description:
Specifies the power sources available on this ZigBee device.
{{list}} {{enum}}

parameter.name: CurrentPowerSource
CurrentPowerSourceLevel
parameter.description:
Specifies the level of charge of the current power source.
{{enum}}

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.UserDescriptor.
object.description: The {{object}} object is an optional descriptor that describes user defined capabilities of the ZigBee device as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.3.2.7 User Descriptor}}. The {{object}} object contains information that allows the user to identify the device using a user-friendly character string, such as "Bedroom TV" or "Stairs Light".

parameter.name: DescriptorAvailable
parameter.description: When {{true}}, the User Descriptor recorded has been received from the target device.

parameter.name: Description
parameter.description: Specifies the information that allows the user to identify the ZigBee device using a user-friendly character string, such as "Bedroom TV" or "Stairs light".

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.ComplexDescriptor.
object.description: The {{object}} object is an optional descriptor that describes extended capabilities of the ZigBee device as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.3.2.6 Complex Descriptor}}.

parameter.name: DescriptorAvailable
parameter.description: When {{true}}, the Complex Descriptor recorded has been received from the target device.

parameter.name: Language
parameter.description: Specifies the ISO 639-1 language code as defined in {{bibref|ISO639-1}}.

parameter.name: CharacterSet
parameter.description: Specifies the ISO 646 character set as defined in {{bibref|ISO646-1991}}.

parameter.name: ManufacturerName
parameter.description: Specifies the name of the manufacturer of the ZigBee device.

parameter.name: ModelName
parameter.description: Specifies the name of the manufacturer's model of the ZigBee device.

parameter.name: SerialNumber
parameter.description: Specifies the manufacturer's serial number of the ZigBee device.

parameter.name: DeviceURL
parameter.description: Specifies the {{datatype}} through which more information relating to the ZigBee device can be obtained.

parameter.name: Icon
parameter.description: The icon field contains an octet string which carries the data for an icon that can represent the ZigBee device. The format of the icon MUST be a 32-by-32-pixel PNG image.

parameter.name: IconURL
parameter.description: Specifies the {{datatype}} through which the icon for the ZigBee device can be obtained.

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.Security.
object.description: The {{object}} object provides the configuration capabilities needed to perform the Security Management functionality defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 4 Security Management}}.

parameter.name: TrustCenterAddress
parameter.description: Specifies the IEEE address of a special device trusted by devices within a ZigBee network to distribute keys for the purpose of network and end-to-end application configuration management.

parameter.name: SecurityLevel
parameter.description:
Specifies how an outgoing frame is to be secured, how an incoming frame purportedly has been secured; it also indicates whether or not the payload is encrypted and to what extent data authenticity over the frame is provided, as reflected by the length of the message integrity code (MIC).
{{enum}}

parameter.name: TimeOutPeriod
parameter.description: The period of time, in {{units}}, that this ZigBee device will wait for an expected security protocol frame.

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.Network.
object.description: The {{object}} object provides the configuration capabilities needed to by a ZigBee Device to operate within a ZigBee Area Network as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.5.2.4 Network Manager}}.

parameter.name: NeighborNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.Network.Neighbor.{i}.
object.description: The {{object}} object provides the configuration capabilities needed to by a ZigBee Device to operate within a ZigBee Area Network as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.5.2.4 Network Manager}}.

parameter.name: Neighbor
parameter.description: Neighbor of this ZigBee device. The value MUST be the path name of a row in the ZigBee.ZDO table. If the referenced row is deleted then this entry MUST be deleted.

parameter.name: LQI
parameter.description: The LQI field specified link quality identification (LQI) for neighbor ZigBee device.

parameter.name: Relationship
parameter.description: The relationship between the neighbor and this device.{{enum}}

parameter.name: PermitJoin
parameter.description: An indication of whether the neighbor device is accepting join requests.{{enum}}

parameter.name: Depth
parameter.description: The tree depth of the neighbor device. A value of 0x00 indicates that the device is the ZigBee coordinator for the network.

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.NodeManager.
object.description: The {{object}} object describes the configuration capabilities related for remote management of the ZigBee Area Network as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.5.2.6 Node Manager}}.

parameter.name: RoutingTableNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.NodeManager.RoutingTable.{i}.
object.description: The {{object}} object describes the route table as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|table 3.51 Routing Table Entry}}.

parameter.name: DestinationAddress
parameter.description: The ZigBee network address of this route.

parameter.name: NextHopAddress
parameter.description: Specifies the network address of the next hop ZigBee device on the way to the destination ZigBee device.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.description: The status of the route entry. {{enum}}

parameter.name: MemoryConstrained
parameter.description: A flag indicating whether the device is a memory constrained concentrator.

parameter.name: ManyToOne
parameter.description: A flag indicating that the destination is a concentrator that issued a many to-one request.

parameter.name: RouteRecordRequired
parameter.description: A flag indicating that a route record command frame should be sent to the destination prior to the next data packet.

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.Binding.{i}.
object.description: The {{object}} object describes the configuration capabilities related to maintaining a ZigBee Device's Binding Table as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.2.8.2 Binding}}.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enables or disables the use of this binding on the device.

parameter.name: Alias
parameter.description: {{datatype|expand}}

parameter.name: SourceEndpoint
parameter.description: Specifies the source endpoint used in this binding entry.

parameter.name: SourceAddress
parameter.description: Specifies the source address used in this binding entry.

parameter.name: ClusterId
parameter.description: Specifies the cluster identifier used in this binding entry.

parameter.name: DestinationAddressMode
parameter.description: Specifies the type of destination address used for this binding entry. {{enum}}

parameter.name: DestinationEndpoint
parameter.description: Specifies the destination endpoint for the binding entry. The value of this field is valid when the value of the {{param|DestinationAddressMode}} is {{enum|Endpoint|DestinationAddressMode}}.

parameter.name: IEEEDestinationAddress
parameter.description: Specifies the IEEE destination address for this binding entry. The value of this field is valid when the value of the {{param|DestinationAddressMode}} is {{enum|Endpoint|DestinationAddressMode}}.

parameter.name: GroupDestinationAddress
parameter.description: Specifies the group destination address for this binding entry. The value of this field is valid when the value of the {{param|DestinationAddressMode}} is {{enum|Group|DestinationAddressMode}}.

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.Group.{i}.
object.description: The {{object}} object describes the configuration capabilities related to maintaining a ZigBee Device's Group Table as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.5.2.7 Group Manager}}.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enables or disables the use of this group on the device.

parameter.name: Alias
parameter.description: {{datatype|expand}}

parameter.name: GroupId
parameter.description: The Group Identifier for this object as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|table 2.25 Group Table Entry Format}}.

parameter.name: EndpointList
parameter.description: The list of application endpoints assigned as a member of this {{object}} object.

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.ApplicationEndpoint.{i}.
object.description: The {{object}} object describes the application endpoint as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.1.2 Application Framework}}.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enables or disables the use of this application endpoint on the device.

parameter.name: Alias
parameter.description: {{datatype|expand}}

parameter.name: EndpointId
parameter.description:
The Endpoint Identifier for this object as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.1.2 Application Framework}}.
An {{object}} with an {{param}} value of 0 is designated as the device application: This is a special application that is responsible for device operation and contains logic to manage the device's networking and general maintenance features.

object.name: Device.ZigBee.ZDO.{i}.ApplicationEndpoint.{i}.SimpleDescriptor.
object.description: The {{object}} object contains the attributes of the Simple Descriptor of an application endpoint, as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.3.2.5 Simple Descriptor}}.

parameter.name: ProfileId
parameter.description: Specifies the application profile that is supported on this endpoint. Application profiles are agreements for messages, message formats, andprocessing actions that enable developers to create an interoperable, distributed application employing application entities that reside on separate ZigBee devices. These application profiles enable applications to send commands, request data, and process commands and requests as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.1.2.1 Application Profiles}}.

parameter.name: DeviceId
parameter.description: Application device identifier, as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.3.2.5.3 Application Device Identifier Field}}.

parameter.name: DeviceVersion
parameter.description: Application device version, as defined in {{bibref|ZigBee2007|section 2.3.2.5.4 Application Device Version Field}}.

parameter.name: InputClusterList
parameter.description: {{list}} Specifies the input cluster identifiers to be matched by the ZigBee coordinator by remote Zigbee device's output cluster list for this {{object}} object.

parameter.name: OutputClusterList
parameter.description: {{list}} Specifies the output cluster identifiers to be matched by the ZigBee coordinator by remote Zigbee device's input cluster list for this {{object}} object.

object.name: Device.ZigBee.Discovery.
object.description: This object is used for managing the discovery of ZigBee devices within a ZigBee Area Network. ZigBee Devices are discovered via the {{object|#.ZDO}} instance associated with the ZigBee Coordinator of an Area Network.

parameter.name: AreaNetworkNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.ZigBee.Discovery.AreaNetwork.{i}.
object.description:
This object specifies the ZigBee devices that are discovered by the {{param|Coordinator}}.
As the ZigBee specification does not provide a discovery protocol between the CWMP proxy and the ZigBee coordinator, the {{object}} object is provisioned and not discovered.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enables or disables discovery of the ZigBee devices in this {{object}}.

parameter.name: LastUpdate
parameter.description: The date and time when this {{object}} or its member devices (i.e., the devices with ZDOs listed in {{param|ZDOList}}) were updated due to a discovery operation.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.description:
The status of the current discovery operation.
{{enum}}

enumeration.description: The discovery operation has not been executed and there are no valid discovery results available)

parameter.name: Alias
parameter.description: {{datatype|expand}}

parameter.name: Coordinator
parameter.description: The Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) or IP address of the ZigBee Coordinator. The coordinator MAY be located within the CPE. In this scenario the Controller or CPE MAY use the value of "localhost".

parameter.name: ZDOReference
ZDOList
